new.cost.center.item.tip1: After adding, you can get into the edit extension field
new.cost.center.item.max36: Up to 36 characters, letters and numbers
new.cost.center.item.tip2: Note: the cost center code will not be modified after it is saved
new.cost.center.item.name: Name of cost center item
new.cost.center.item.index_tip: To maintain a certain step size between the serial numbers, it is convenient for subsequent adjustment, such as the first 10, interval 10
new.cost.center.item.tips3: The cost center item extension field can be edited in the cost center cost field extension field.
